pages.title: Vault Runes
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Runes$() are a Crystal modification Itemgroup introduced past $(#033dfc)Level 75$(), which allows you to add guaranteed $(#033dfc)Vault Rooms$() to your Vault by applying them via an Anvil to $(#033dfc)a Crystal$().

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Runes$() are obtained through finding them in the Vault inside $(#033dfc)Vault Chests$().$(br2)Vaults that have $(#033dfc)Vault Runes$() applied to them will not be able to drop other $(#033dfc)Vault Runes$(), hence why they will not appear in JEI as a loot table item.
